reviews.title: Bad
reviews.text:
I wrote this to their management. Received the feedback in person and on phone calls.
1) I checked in on 05-06-2025: I was literally shocked with the behaviour of chauffeurs at the main gate who didnâ€™t bother to help with the luggage and despite asking for help, I had pick up my luggage despite asking for help. This was around 2347 hours. I mentioned the issue at the check-in counter. I somehow let it go, as I may understand that your personnel might be busy. I felt odd but as mentioned, I let it go.
2) On 06-Jun-2025: I had dinner in Frangpani restaurant and ordered mutton kala sukkha (something like that) and risotto. I got mostly bones in the mutton and risotto was absolutely not up to the mark. The issue was notified and the chef acknowledged the shortcomings and offered a discount. However, me and my partner refused not to accept the discount, as we were there for quality time. My objective was to send a feedback so that they do not ruin other customerâ€™s moment of leisure. I let it go.
3) On 07-06-2025, 2 incidents happened:
i) During the breakfast time at Maxican Room, your employee passed on a racist comment targeting my partner among his colleague which I overheard. This was unacceptable and at this moment, I couldnâ€™t let it go. I reported it.
Your employee accepted what he said and apologised but it ruined the entire feel of having a quality time at your 5 star hotel.
ii) I ordered food at 21:00 hours for Dinner and the entire order came in parts, first part came in 30-40 min post ordering ( I also informed the in-house dinning guy that I will be waiting for the second part). The second part of the order came at 2230 hours. I had to return the order as the first part got cold and the quality has been reduced as expected. The manager confirmed that they missed it. My partner and me had to return back without food and due to late arrival of meal my partner had minor gastrointestinal issues, which is being taken care now.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.text: Good sized room and decent bathroomGood location, now that the coastal road is operationalDecent breakfast Not enough sitting space in the lobbyNo place to have a cigar in the eveningRoom card sokmetimes didnt work well in the liftFlush didnt work well in the room; had to call housekeeping to fix

reviews.title: Great location. Comfortable and excellent service
reviews.text: The room was very comfortable and service was excellent. The location is great as south Mumbai has very little traffic congestion and it's ready to get to a large variety of restaurants and other entertainment. I had to pay for scanning a few documents at the business center. It didn't cost much, but it surprised me that a 5 star hotel does not provide this service

reviews.title: 10/10 hotel experience.
reviews.text: I would like to extend my thanks for all Trident staff I have enjoyed my stay at this hotel. The staff were warm, friendly, and very welcoming, they helped me in everything I needed help with throughout my stay. The rooms were cozy and comfortable, a perfect environment to rest in. The breakfast was very delicious and the options were plenty. I genuinely enjoyed my stay here and I would definitely recommend visiting/staying here.

reviews.title: Amazing stay and will revisit!
reviews.text:
Very relaxed atmosphere. Not stuffy at all as some 5 star hotels can be. Staff was excellent. Courteous, attentive and efficient.
My room was spotless. Plenty of towels, which was wonderful.
Very receptive to my request not to have my room cleaned for the 4 nights I was there.
My room was spacious with a full sea view (Executive Ocean View Room) on the 31st floor. I didn't use any of the facilities (pool, gym, spa etc) so can't comment
